translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

With your letter of the 8th of the current month arrived the 390 horses that Your Lordship Fidêncio Machado, who performed this commission most excellently, for said horses arrived in very good condition. Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of the Treasury in Piratini, January 10, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Right Division.
